entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vector<T> Can't Read Data Properly. #88291
  • [API Proposal]: Uuid v5 and v7 implementations into System.Guid #88290
  • Potential (~5% chance) AccessViolationException in ReadyToRun .NET 7 executable targeting RID osx.11.0-arm64/osx.12-arm64 when running a child process for the first time, and both standard output and standard error are redirected #88288
  • Distribute macOS symbols as dSYM, not .dwarf #88286
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Marshalling structs containing strings/interfaces #88284
  • can't dotnet run x86 at x64 on net8 #88283
  • Possibly broken NuGet package for System.Data.Odbc 7.0 #88281

Closed

  • [ProfilerAPI] Different reserved region sizes reported for frozen segment #87834
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path doesn't work for satellite assemblies #88285
  • NativeAOT: Asking for Array<T> MethodTable #88287
  • Add feature-switch for invariant TimeZone support #37973
    8.0.0
  • [8.0-preview.5] Possible Issue with AsyncLocal<T>/TaskCreationOptions.RunContinuationsAsynchronously #87628
    8.0.0
  • ExcecutionEngineException when using StringBuilder on long strings #88199
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.NeedlessExceptionInMessage #87934
    8.0.0
  • TryParseExact not working properly for TimeSpan and custom format not working for "\" in DateTime and DateTimeOffset #88119

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement ICollection<T> on several LINQ iterators #88249
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unify JIT interface getTypeLayout between VM and crossgen2; refine what is considered "significant padding" #88238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix make repro cli command #88289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in regular promotion #88130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Apply a number of improvements and bugfixes to JsonNode #88194
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix Out of memory with source gen tests #88266
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Don't set patchpoints in methods with CORINFO_DEBUG_CODE #88227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tar: set directory modification times while extracting. #88231
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade to LLVM 16 & C++17, and bundle libc++ on Linux #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix OptionsValidator source-gen to skip static and const members #88254
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Expose stack trace metadata stripping as a supported option #88235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #88218
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [iOS] Add temp cindex attribute to build on xcode 15 #88261
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\7.0.4\hostfxr.dll failed #31304
  • Multiple -s/--source flags on "dotnet build" and "dotnet restore" not working #27202
    Discussion
  • "The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from C:\Program Files (x86)\dotnet\host\fxr\3.1.1\hostfxr.dll failed" #4240
  • How to make `dotnet run` invoke an MSBuild target? #31253
    8.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error for a DIM on an inaccessible type through a reference #68851
  • Add hooks to function calls #68850
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer is not reporting capabilities according to lsp-spec. #68849

Closed

  • MemberNotNullAttribute not working as expected when member is in a parent Interface/Class #68836

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update PublishData.json #68847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #49140
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextSansFilter #49139
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, updates #49134
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextWithFilter, plainTextWithFilter #49133
  • Blazor substitute for the input tag helper #49132
  • ViewData / ViewBag equivalent for Blazor server side rendering #49131
  • Response & output caching for Blazor server-side rendering #49130

Closed

  • asp.net core bin folder on publish to group all binaries #47982
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #49124
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49125
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, single_query #49123
  • WASM Cors fails despite allowing everything #49094
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity:2.2.0 #49101

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `04cf298` to `be03d00` #49137
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `04cf298` to `be03d00` #49136
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestedThemeChanged fires at Home button press event and shows wrong RequestedTheme in iOS #15962
  • "Execution Failed" When trying to run app with iPhone simulator #15961
  • Picker looses the ability to pick/present items on small windows #15954

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] 20230701 Android ecosystem updates #15960
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15955
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Grid star expansion fixes #15938
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • [X] Compiled Bindings to Array #15944

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Disable lazy loading temporarily for a query #31158
  • Migration bundle creation fails on DevOps, does not authenticate against private NuGet feed #27456
    Backlog
  • Implement JSON serialization/deserialization via Utf8JsonReader/Utf8JsonWriter #30604
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #30604 - Implement JSON serialization/deserialization via Utf8JsonReader/Utf8JsonWriter #31160
